channel.title: What to flip?
channel.description: A friend lent me 20m which adds onto my 15m which gives me 35m. I was wondering what should I flip to make the most profit. I normally do frost dragon bones, sharks and air battle staves but i hit my quota for the next few hours. What should I flip that makes the most profit the fastest?

item.title: What to flip?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:

RiiPiiNFtW owes me 20m. He hasn’t responded.

he’s ignoring you lul, scaameeed0rzz

Last Active: Today at 12:23:35 PM

Maybe…
[/quote]I know I still owe you. I am leaving though for two weeks and have been on xbox because my membership ran out. Catch me with a pm on the. 22nd and ill pay you back

Never logs in again, deletes all digital finger prints, and moves to Mongolia to become a farmer.[/quote]Lmao, I just flipped 1.5m

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Here’s what I don’t get about this thread.

The more people read it, the more start doing exactly what you’re doing, making it ineffective. People just need to follow the 2 rules of economics

  1. A businessman must never reveal his methods.

item.title: What to flip?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:11, topic:445409”][quote author=Doggie Skill link=topic=548161.msg4020009#msg4020009 date=1339955624]
Figure it out yourself…

Also, look at my sig
[/quote]It is true. Compared to you, I have a job, a Girl, and a life. If you had access to logs on my activity you’d see im only active on weekends (3/4 of the time). Used to have no life, but I turned 16 and now I have a job and money to fund a limited teenage life. GF?[/quote]
You shouldn’t talk like that, it makes you sound stupid and in other posts you don’t seem stupid lol. I’m not trying to insult you, just telling you what I think and most probably some other people are thinking.

Anyways OT: rather than flipping why don’t you just use the money to play and you can make gps playing epicwin o.0.

Jc22493:

You still owe me 20m.

Who owes you 20m;o? Jw, i r being nosy xD

Read full topic

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Guys let’s discuss RiiPiiNFtW’s life on this thread because that’s totally fucking relevant and a very fucking interesting topic!!!

@OP I haven’t really done any large scale merching but coal and most runes were good. There was a time when rune scimitars were good flipping too, but really if you want to find the best items you should look on the runescape GE database.

item.title: What to flip?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Glacor boots, simple explanation short(not sure if still applicable) best boots ingame. Theirs quite a few pairs but since it is a ‘rich’ persons item people generally pay +5 - +10% rather than waiting cause they have the money. Can vary depending on current economy staus ofc. At a few points I was making 1m of a pair of ragefires. But ofc this was a long time ago, when steads were still 46m.

Read full topic
